Pros: Most aspects were manageable but the hr strategies in place are questionable
Cons: It was good working at the company for a while but things shifted so fast. Dismissals nowadays comes with no notice or warning, treating staff like assets or items that you'd dispose anyhow is their thing nowodays, no matter how loyal you are. Tell me why they would expire a contract for a committed employee who've been there for more than five years, then bring some new staff and even before probation ends , they're confirmed as permanent staff..these are guys who have not even mastered the basic roles..but for you, you got to wait for 5 years and more been on contract only for them to end the contract without at least issuing a notice prior, mind you the performance is good and no disciplinary cases whatsoever,
